TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileLoadException extends System.IO.IOException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileLoadException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 找到托管程序集但不能加载时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a managed assembly is found but cannot be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示当找不到 文件时出现的错误。Represents the error that occurs when a file is found but cannot be loaded. 如果文件无法加载，则会引发 异常，因为找不到该文件。The exception is thrown when the file fails to load because it cannot be located. 如果文件已找到，但由于权限不足而无法加载，则会引发 。If the file is located, but cannot be loaded due to insufficient permissions, a is thrown. `FileLoadException` 具有 COR_E_FILELOAD 的默认 HRESULT，该默认值为0x80131621，但这不是唯一可能的 HRESULT。`FileLoadException` has the default HRESULT of COR_E_FILELOAD, which has the value 0x80131621, but this is not the only possible HRESULT. 如果你的代码没有 的权限，则此异常的错误消息可能只包含文件或目录名称，而不是完全限定的路径。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths. > [!NOTE] > [Windows 应用商店应用](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](/dotnet/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library)中未包含此异常，但它由某些成员引发。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](/dotnet/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，请改为写入 的 `catch` 语句。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead. **相关提示****Associated Tips** **请确保该文件是有效的 .NET Framework 程序集。****Make sure that the file is a valid .NET Framework assembly.** 如果文件不是有效的 .NET Framework 程序集，则会引发此异常。This exception is thrown if the file is not a valid .NET Framework assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . **检查以确保未使用两个不同的证据加载两次程序集或模块。****Check to make sure an assembly or module was not loaded twice with two different evidences.** 证据是输入安全策略决策的一组信息（如代码可授予哪些权限）。Evidence is the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions, such as what permissions can be granted to code. 有关详细信息，请参阅和For more information, see and **如果使用 或 方法，请检查以确保程序集名称的长度不超过系统定义的最大长度。****If using the or methods, check to make sure the assembly name is not longer than the system-defined maximum length.** 程序集名称的长度不能超过系统定义的最大值。The assembly name's length cannot exceed the system-defined maximum. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . **如果加载附属程序集，请确保指定的 CultureInfo 与文件的 CultureInfo 匹配。****If loading a satellite assembly, make sure the specified CultureInfo matches the file's CultureInfo.** 附属程序集包含本地化资源，这些资源包含单个区域性（用作默认或非特定区域性）的非本地化可执行代码和资源。Satellite assemblies contain localized resources which contain non-localizable executable code and resources for a single culture that serve as the default or neutral culture. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not load the specified file."

summary.span: 此消息会考虑当前系统区域性。

span.span: This message takes into account the current system culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新实例的 属性和 属性将初始化为 `null`。The property and property of the new instance are initialized to `null`.

param.name: message

span.span: A that describes the error.

param.span: 的内容设计为易于理解。

param.name: inner
param.span: 引起当前异常的异常。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不为 ，则当前异常将在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 `InnerException` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 `message` 和 属性，使用 `fileName`初始化新实例的 属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message` and the property using `fileName`. 新实例的 属性初始化为 `null`。The property of the new instance is initialized to `null`. 不需要是存储在磁盘上的文件;它可以是支持访问流的系统的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，根据系统，此类可能能够访问物理设备。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为前一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性将返回传递给构造函数的同一值；如果 `InnerException` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `null`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 不需要是存储在磁盘上的文件;它可以是支持访问流的系统的任何部分。 is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access to streams. 例如，根据系统，此类可能能够访问物理设备。For example, depending on the system, this class might be able to access a physical device. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取导致该异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.

value.span: 一个 ，包含具有无效图像的文件的名称；或者，如果没有将文件名传递给当前实例的构造函数，则为空引用。

span.span: A containing the name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回为当前实例提供的构造函数的文件的名称（如果有）。This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any. 如果未指定文件名或为空引用，则此属性返回空引用。If the file name was not specified or is a null reference, this property returns a null reference. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取错误消息和引发此异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

value.span: 包含错误消息和引发此异常的文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 如果没有为当前异常的构造函数提供消息，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果 属性不是 null 引用，则该消息将包含文件名，例如 "无法加载文件 a `FileName`。"If the property is not a null reference, the message includes the file name, for example, "Unable to load file a `FileName`." （`FileName` 表示 返回的值。）如果 `null`，则系统提供的消息会将其指示为 "（null）"。(a `FileName` represents the value returned by .) If is `null`, this is indicated in the system-supplied message as "(null)". 系统提供的消息将考虑当前系统区域性。The system-supplied message takes into account the current system culture. 此属性为只读。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回当前异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of the current exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 一个字符串，它包含此异常的完全限定名，还可能包含错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪（取决于所使用的 构造函数）。

span.span: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception, and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace, depending on which constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包括异常的名称、 的值 属性的值以及调用 的结果。The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果其中任何一个成员为 null 引用，则其值不包含在返回的字符串中。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
